      • doesMountRenderTreeHosts

        public boolean doesMountRenderTreeHosts()
        Description copied from class: RenderUnit
        Override this method to indicate if a RenderUnit has nested RenderTreeHosts, it will ensure that they are notified when this RenderUnit's bounds change and visibility events are processed correctly for them.
        Overrides:
        doesMountRenderTreeHosts in class RenderUnit<java.lang.Object>
        Returns:
        true to ensure nested RenderTreeHosts are notified about parent's bounds change, otherwise false
